channel.title: Cache Staff crowns, background fail Repp++
channel.description:
Hey guys, so i never did this before :s but i want to change the gay ass costum crown to a normal runescape one so i found some runescape crowns
and i delete the background in photoshop:
[img]http://i42.servimg.com/u/f42/16/52/06/54/mopar_10.png[/img]
then i save it as a .png
and opening toms cache suit and replace the .png ones for the costum ones that are in there.
but then i still see a colour around the crowns :s
anyone knows how to do this? will repp+_+
